mapper.select: select js.id ,js.group_id,js.editor,js.title, js."content",js.start_date as startDate,js.end_date as endDate ,jg."name" as groupname from JHTA01_SCHEDULE js inner join jhta01_group jg on js.group_id = jg.id where js.id = #{id}
mapper.update: set title = #{title}, "content" = #{content}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate], updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id}
